Self.Wiki: This map object represents a non-player character invasion within the map.

HostEntityID.Wiki: The entity ID of the non-player character whose world the player enters.

EventFlagID.Wiki: The event flag set when the player is within the region.

ActivateGoodsID.Wiki: The item that is used to trigger the non-player character invasion.

CeremonyParamID.Wiki: The ceremony ID this invasion occurs in.

SpawnRegionEntityID.Wiki: The ID of the spawnpoint that the player uses when entering this 'fake' invasion.

PlayerChrType.Wiki: The character type the player uses when in the 'fake' invasion world.

MessageSetType.Wiki: Determines which set of FMG entries to use in fake' invasion world.

JoinMessageTextID.Wiki: The ID of FMG entry to display when trying to join 'fake' invasion world.
